text: George Varaljay (born 9 March 1941) is a Canadian fencer. He competed in the individual and team épée events at the 1976 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian male fencers Category:Olympic fencers of Canada Category:Fencers at the 1976 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Budapest
title: George Varaljay
